verses.esv: 48 You therefore must be perfect, as your heavenly Father is perfect.
verses.kjv: 48 Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.
verses.niv: 48 Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect.

verses.esv:
14   I praise you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made.
  Wonderful are your works;
    my soul knows it very well.
verses.kjv: 14 I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
verses.niv: 14 I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

verses.esv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.
verses.kjv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
verses.niv: 10 For we are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

verses.esv:
4   The LORD has made everything for its purpose,
    even the wicked for the day of trouble.
verses.kjv: 4 The LORD hath made all things for himself: yea, even the wicked for the day of evil.
verses.niv: 4 The LORD works out everything for his own ends- even the wicked for a day of disaster.

verses.esv: 2 Count it all joy, my brothers, when you meet trials of various kinds, 3 for you know that the testing of your faith produces steadfastness. 4 And let steadfastness have its full effect, that you may be perfect and complete, lacking in nothing.
verses.kjv: 2 My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations; 3 Knowing this, that the trying of your faith worketh patience. 4 But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
verses.niv: 2 Consider it pure joy, my brothers, whenever you face trials of many kinds, 3 because you know that the testing of your faith develops perseverance. 4 Perseverance must finish its work so that you may be mature and complete, not lacking anything.

verses.esv: 14 For by a single offering he has perfected for all time those who are being sanctified.
verses.kjv: 14 For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.
verses.niv: 14 because by one sacrifice he has made perfect forever those who are being made holy.

verses.esv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,
verses.kjv: 23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.niv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,

verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.

verses.esv:
7   I form light and create darkness;
    I make well-being and create calamity;
    I am the LORD, who does all these things.
verses.kjv: 7 I form the light, and create darkness: I make peace, and create evil: I the LORD do all these things.
verses.niv: 7 I form the light and create darkness, I bring prosperity and create disaster; I, the LORD, do all these things.

verses.esv:
27   So God created man in his own image,
    in the image of God he created him;
    male and female he created them.
verses.kjv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
verses.niv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv:
26   Whoever trusts in his own mind is a fool,
    but he who walks in wisdom will be delivered.
verses.kjv: 26 He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.
verses.niv: 26 He who trusts in himself is a fool, but he who walks in wisdom is kept safe.

verses.esv: 3 He is the radiance of the glory of God and the exact imprint of his nature, and he upholds the universe by the word of his power. After making purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high,
verses.kjv: 3 Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;
verses.niv: 3 The Son is the radiance of God's glory and the exact representation of his being, sustaining all things by his powerful word. After he had provided purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty in heaven.

verses.esv: 4 And let steadfastness have its full effect, that you may be perfect and complete, lacking in nothing.
verses.kjv: 4 But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
verses.niv: 4 Perseverance must finish its work so that you may be mature and complete, not lacking anything.

verses.esv:
9   The heart is deceitful above all things,
    and desperately sick;
    who can understand it?
verses.kjv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?
verses.niv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it?

verses.esv: 1:1 There was a man in the land of Uz whose name was Job, and that man was blameless and upright, one who feared God and turned away from evil.
verses.kjv: 1 There was a man in the land of Uz, whose name was Job; and that man was perfect and upright, and one that feared God, and eschewed evil.
verses.niv: 1 In the land of Uz there lived a man whose name was Job. This man was blameless and upright; he feared God and shunned evil.

verses.esv: 19 I call heaven and earth to witness against you today, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and curse. Therefore choose life, that you and your offspring may live,
verses.kjv: 19 I call heaven and earth to record this day against you, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live:
verses.niv: 19 This day I call heaven and earth as witnesses against you that I have set before you life and death, blessings and curses. Now choose life, so that you and your children may live

verses.esv: 9 But he said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
verses.kjv: 9 And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
verses.niv: 9 But he said to me, "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness." Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me.

verses.esv: 26 It was to show his righteousness at the present time, so that he might be just and the justifier of the one who has faith in Jesus.
verses.kjv: 26 To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
verses.niv: 26 he did it to demonstrate his justice at the present time, so as to be just and the one who justifies those who have faith in Jesus.

verses.esv: 6 And the LORD said, “Behold, they are one people, and they have all one language, and this is only the beginning of what they will do. And nothing that they propose to do will now be impossible for them.
verses.kjv: 6 And the LORD said, Behold, the people is one, and they have all one language; and this they begin to do: and now nothing will be restrained from them, which they have imagined to do.
verses.niv: 6 The LORD said, "If as one people speaking the same language they have begun to do this, then nothing they plan to do will be impossible for them.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

verses.esv: 21 So I find it to be a law that when I want to do right, evil lies close at hand.
verses.kjv: 21 I find then a law, that, when I would do good, evil is present with me.
verses.niv: 21 So I find this law at work: When I want to do good, evil is right there with me.

verses.esv: 2 For we all stumble in many ways. And if anyone does not stumble in what he says, he is a perfect man, able also to bridle his whole body.
verses.kjv: 2 For in many things we offend all. If any man offend not in word, the same is a perfect man, and able also to bridle the whole body.
verses.niv: 2 We all stumble in many ways. If anyone is never at fault in what he says, he is a perfect man, able to keep his whole body in check.
